entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon then becoming west 20 gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
